!Trader Ian: Welcome to the center of magic: the Ivory Tower! People now tend to think of the Ivory Tower primarily as a research institute, but it once was a powerful political faction that controlled the mainland. And where do you think all that accumulate knowledge and magic is stored? Right here in the Tower! If there is another earth-shaking crisis, look no further than the Ivory Tower for the solution -- and probably the cause!
